item.description:
This meetup meeting on 5/27 will be a gathering, like a party, in a private home, of course, we can still
practise Chinese conversation. This gathering is suggested by Aaron for Jeff's China trip leaving on 6/1.

We may do bao jiao zi before the meetup, please respond if you like bao jiao zi ;)
item.how_to_find_us: Please check mapquest and plug in the meetup meeting address.
item.why: As in learning any language, practising makes it perfect, there's no substitute for it ;)
item.name: Help2LearnChinese May's 4th-Tuesday Meeting
